name: The Tree Sentinel
description:
A game where you defend a tree against enemies that are getting ever stronger. To defend yourself, you must build defenses and call to arms helpful allies by using your energy, your sap. You regain sap passively and as your tree grows, so will your passive gains, but for you to grow, you must grow your roots to find water sources.

Made With 2 Developpers and no artists. Thanks to all artists on opengamearts for provinding CC0 arts.

Arts By :

Movicx - https://opengameart.org/content/rock-projectile-0

dulsi - https://opengameart.org/content/squirrels
